directions: Microwave Method: In microwave safe bowl, combine tomatoes and cheese. Microwave on HIGH for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted; stir after 2 minutes; remove from oven and stir to combine.
Conventional Method: In large saucepan, combine tomatoes and cheese. Stir over low heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can RED GOLD® Petite Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies
1 pound pasteurized prepared cheese product, cubed
title: World's Best Queso Dip
